verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Years I spent in vanity and pride, Caring not my Lord was crucifed, Knowing not it was for me He died On Calvary.

verse.name: c
v2
verse.lines: By God's Word at last my sin I learned; Then I trembled at the law I'd spurned, Till my guilty soul imploring turned To Calvary.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Now I've giv'n to Jesus ev'rything, Now I gladly own Him as my King, Now my raptured soul can only sing Of Calvary.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Oh, the love that drew salvation's plan! Oh, the grace that brought it down to man! Oh, the mighty gulf that God did span At Calvary.
